description: Uygulama açılır ve ana ekranda kısa bir bekleme yapılır.

steps.name: Then  "Movies" should be visible on the screen
And  User click on "Award Winners" button
Then  User click on AnatomyPoster button
Then  User scroll to TheGoodFather poster
Then  User click on TheGoodFather poster
Then  User click on Watch Button poster
